Recommendations are a free service aimed to help you choosing from our wide range of content (movies, series, sports games, shows …) according to your taste. Recommendations keep learning your viewing habits in real time, and suggest personalized content you can find interesting based on predefined algorithms. Please provide your consent to process your information and activate personalized content.
Terms and Conditions for use of Recommendation Service

1.1. With these Special Terms and Conditions for the use of the Telekom Slovenia Recommendation Service, dd, it defines the rights, obligations, and rules for using the Recommendation Service. 

 1.2. The specific terms and conditions for the use of the Service Recommendations shall apply, together with the General Terms and Conditions for the use of Telekom Slovenije's electronic communications services, d.d. (hereinafter SPU), Special Terms and Conditions for the use of fixed electronic communications services hereinafter referred to as PP) and the TViN Web site sales offer. 

 1.3. For all that is not specified in these Special Terms of Service.

2.1. It is a recommendation that helps the user of the television service (TV) to choose a variety of video content (movies, series, sports games, shows …) according to his taste.

 2.2. The Recommendation service by monitoring the real-time video viewing habits using predefined algorithms recommends that the user of the content be interesting for the user, based on his sample of views.

 2.3. For the operation of the service, it is necessary to store and process information about which TV programs or contents the user is watching, or which TV and TVN services use. By using the Recommendation, the user agrees to the processing (storage, use) of data in accordance with these Special Terms for the use of the Service Recommendation, SPU and PP.

 2.4. The Recommendation service does not recommend adult content and certain other content that is not recommended within the service. Content for adults is considered to be all content on program sites on TV that are explicitly erotic.

 2.5. Telekom Slovenije provides services either alone or through contract partners.
3. Who can be a subscriber / user?

3.1. The Recommendation service is available to all users of TV Telekom Slovenije\'s services, who agree with the Special Conditions for the use of the Service Recommendation before using the Recommendation service.
4.1. The use of the Recommendation service is charged at the price list.

5.1. By subscribing to the Service Recommendation, the user or subscriber agrees that Telekom Slovenije may process (in particular collect, store and use) the following information on the use of TV and TV and Telekom Slovenije services: terminal equipment (TVkomunikator identifier and MAC address of the STB or a TV communicator), a customer identifier, subscriber program subscription program subscription and subscription details, data on purchases and views of content on demand (VOD), linear television ratings (telemetry, view back), feedback on the suitability of recommended content , switches to program places (channels), switching method (via dial, program location), switching time, show identifier, start time, duration, action (view, pause, forward, rewind), commands received by TV -communicator.

 5.2. The usage data will be processed by Telekom Slovenije for the purpose of operating the recommendation service at all times when the subscriber or user uses the service of the recommendation. Unless otherwise specified in these special conditions or other conditions (eg for individual services), Telekom Slovenije will use the usage data, processed for other purposes specified in these Terms, and the PP for the current month and for a further three months from the end of the month in which they were collected.

 5.3. Telekom Slovenije will use the data specified in this Chapter 5, alone or with the participation of third parties, for the purposes set out in the SPU, PP and these conditions, for the preparation, management and production of statistics and analyzes of the content of individual content (for example, TV programs) in a set of TV and TVN services to personalize the offer and profiling of users and for other purposes for which it has or obtains the appropriate authorization.

 5.4. Data in anonymized form and the results of analyzes of data in a form that can not be determined by an individual user can be stored permanently.

 5.5. Telekom Slovenije may process data and data analysis results (including connection with) together with other data collected in the conclusion and implementation of a subscription.

 5.6. For the purposes set out in this chapter, Telekom Slovenije may use information on the use of its services in an anonymous form (ie one that would normally prevent third parties from identifying users) and forward the results of analyzes to the processing and use (including commercial use) to third parties for their permanent use.

 5.7. Telekom Slovenije or third parties may market the statistical data and the results of the analyzes, forward them to third parties, publish or otherwise make available to third parties or the public without restriction, except that they must always ensure that they do not contain data that would to third parties or to the general public, to enable users to identify.

 5.8. Data collected in accordance with point 5.1. it can cover all content and all program sites on TV and TViN.

6.1. The Recommendation service within the data collected in accordance with point 5. does not process adult content views or adult content are included in the recommendations provided by the Recommendation Service.

 6.2. For content for adults, all program sites on TV that display the content of an explicitly erotic nature are considered to be.

 6.3. Recommendations also do not include recommendations for content that Telekom Slovenije decides not to include in the Recommendation service.

 6.4. Telekom Slovenije does not provide any assurances that the recommended content or only recommended content will be of interest to the user of the service Recommendation

7.1. To terminate the use of the service, the subscriber may apply in Telekom\'s centers or through the service pages.\n\n 7.2. Until the termination of the service, Telekom Slovenije may use the collected data in accordance with these terms and conditions.

8.1. Special terms and conditions for the use of the Service The recommendations have the character of the contract and are an integral part of the subscription contract.

 8.2. If the provisions of the Special Conditions for the Use of the Service Recommendation, which are different from those of the SPU and the PP, the provisions of the Special Conditions for the Use of the Recommendation Service shall apply. However, if the provisions of the Special Conditions for the Use of the Service Recommendation are otherwise governed by the provisions of the Agreement, the provisions of the Agreement shall apply.

 8.3. These Special Terms and Conditions for the use of the Service Recommendations shall enter into force on 1 January 2017 and shall be published and available on Telekom Slovenije's website and the points of sale of Telekom Slovenije.

Choose to be notified when we are introducing new mobile phones, packages, or services that are in accordance with your needs.\n\n By doing so, you agree to be acquainted with the benefits and offers that are personalized to you personally and allow Telekom Slovenije to process your information, data on the use of the company\'s services, its websites and applications, social networks, the Loyalty Program, as well as traffic and location data from this contractual relationship. Data can be processed for the preparation and transmission of personalized offers via SMS / MMS, e-mail, classical mail, calls / video calls, social networks, television, multimedia platforms, applications, and company websites.

NEO allows your home to perform certain tasks automatically. Simplify tasks by sequencing events that are triggered automatically or manually. For example, NEO can trigger scenarios based on time of day, your location, sensor detection, and more.
You can create scenarios through the NEO mobile application
To change the programming scheme, first create your profile.
The channel order can be edited only on current active profile
Satisfaction with NEO - a platform for Smart Living
Hello, we strive to be an inspiration and provide you with the best possible user experience, so please take a moment to answer a few short questions.
How likely are you to recommend the Smart Living NEO platform to a friend or acquaintance?
1. On the remote control, press and
Telekom Slovenije team wishes you a nice day.

By submitting your assessment you your agree with Telekom Slovenije processing the survey data, with the purpose of improving the user experience and the quality, and, in case of ambiguity, to call, text or e-mail you.
